name: AskfmForHumans
description: Multifunctional bot intended to mend some of ASKfm's screwups

AFH_API_KEY.description: ASKfm API signing key in hex

AFH_PRIVATE_KEY.description: 1024-bit RSA private key in PKCS#1 v1.5 PEM format

AFH_PUBLIC_KEY.description: 1024-bit RSA public key in PKCS#1 v1.5 PEM format

AFH_BOT_USERNAME.description: Bot username (required when bot type is normal, useless otherwise)

AFH_BOT_PASSWORD.description: Bot password (required when bot type is normal, useless otherwise)
